text: Juan Carlos Touriño (14 July 1944 – 7 March 2017) was a Spanish football defender. He won two Spanish league titles and two Spanish Cup with Real Madrid. He made one appearance for the Spanish national team. ==Death== Touriño died at a hospital in Buenos Aires on the night of 7 March 2017 from pancreatic disease, aged 72. ==Titles== Real Madrid *La Liga (3): 1971-72, 1973-74, 1974-75 *Copa del Rey (2): 1973-74, 1974–75 ==References== ==Other websites== * Spain statistics * World Football profile Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Argentina Category:Deaths from pancreatic disease Category:Spanish footballers Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires
title: Juan Carlos Touriño
